description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
	Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

New Features
PDFNEWNET-15072	produce PDF files that conform to PDF/X-1 (ISO 15930) standard.
PDFNEWNET-18802	PDF/X validation
PDFNEWNET-33790	Converting HTML to PDF - Font Issue
PDFNEWNET-35233	How to allow only numeric values in (textbox) form field
PDFNEWNET-35487	Support of PDF/X-1A: 2001 compliance
PDFNEWNET-35926	Shrink a Multipage PDF document to single page PDF document
PDFNEWNET-35942	PDF to HTML - Split CSS to files, when resultant HTML is split to pages
PDFNEWNET-35951	PDF to HTML: Extract Images,Fonts and CSS in separate folders and create their aliases
PDFNEWNET-36023	Support adding/updating a field
PDFNEWNET-36064	Support of required field flag for a from field

Enhancements
PDFNEWNET-34273	PDF/A-1a conversion stopped working in .Net version 7.2.0.0 and 7.3.0.0
PDFNEWNET-35530	How to preserve form field formatting, while filing form.
PDFNEWNET-35740	TextBoxField appearance issue
PDFNEWNET-35834	Add JavaScript to PushButton using Aspose.Pdf.Generator
PDFNEWNET-35882	ExportXML/ImportXML methods doesn't honor Checkbox group subfield values
PDFNEWNET-35940	PDF to HTML - For non vector SVG elements, convert them to PNG / JPG
PDFNEWNET-35941	PDF to HTML - Shorten font names
PDFNEWNET-35981	PDF to XPS - Resultant file size is too large
PDFNEWNET-36047	Mark Producer and Creator properties of DocumentInfo as Read Only
PDFNEWNET-36054	Text of a cell with rowspan value that spanned over the pages, appears on only first page

Exceptions
PDFNEWNET-33860	HTML to PDF conversion - Exception found
PDFNEWNET-35902	Optimize operation throws an Object Reference not set exception
PDFNEWNET-35921	Null reference exception when calling OptimizeResources method
PDFNEWNET-35932	InValidOperationException is being thrown on FillField method
PDFNEWNET-35947	NullReferenceException while splitting PDF to pages
PDFNEWNET-35994	PDF to HTML: Upgrading from 8.1 to 8.5 throwing NullReferenceException
PDFNEWNET-36019	HTML to PDF: Vladimir Script Font throwing StackOverFlow exception
PDFNEWNET-36101	Filling a form results in InvalidCastException

Bugs
PDFNEWNET-34972	PDF generation time is longer in new release versions
PDFNEWNET-35027	Unable to use Aspose.Pdf in VS 2008/2010 C++/CLR (error C2686)
PDFNEWNET-35518	PDF concatenation - resultnt file opens in the middle document
PDFNEWNET-35555	Links are not working when merging Interactive PDF files
PDFNEWNET-35664	Tiff to Pdf conversion: SystemImage property of ImageInfo renders only first frame
PDFNEWNET-35793	Aspose.pdf with C++/CLI: compilation error C2686
PDFNEWNET-35832	CreateWebLink() incorrectly places link above matching text
PDFNEWNET-35837	Unable to add JavaScript to PushButton
PDFNEWNET-35852	Attachment corrupts, while we add attachment and encrypt simultaneously
PDFNEWNET-35869	FormEditor: Change in rectangle coordinates has not impact on radio button size
PDFNEWNET-35879	PageInfo doesn't return correct values
PDFNEWNET-35883	Error importing annotations from xfdf file
PDFNEWNET-35906	Hidden page element prints when using PdfViewer
PDFNEWNET-35909	Unable to retrieve form fields information
PDFNEWNET-35931	Aspose.VerticalAlignment doesn't place textstamp at correct location when page sizes is large
PDFNEWNET-35971	PDF to PNG: document text is missing in resultant image
PDFNEWNET-35982	PDF to XPS - Text is rendering twice
PDFNEWNET-36028	Table border is not appearing correctly on subsequent page
PDFNEWNET-36033	PDF to JPEG - Garbled contents in resultant file
PDFNEWNET-36034	Annotation import - cloud outbox is changed to stright line
PDFNEWNET-36035	Annotations import - When rotating callouts, text comes out of outbox or text is hidden
PDFNEWNET-36036	Header of Subsequent table is not appearing
PDFNEWNET-36042	Import Annotations - Text rotation, missing arrow, wrong padding issues
PDFNEWNET-36049	Using same stamp object for different PDF document results in corrupt output document
PDFNEWNET-36051	Exception while reading links from PDF file
PDFNEWNET-36059	Markup annotation is not honoring Rectangular coordinates
PDFNEWNET-36065	Nested table is not working in 8.5 and above
PDFNEWNET-36068	Wrong / missing trailer information from PDF
PDFNEWNET-36077	Adding an image to a pdf results a in blurry / not readable document
PDFNEWNET-36091	TXT to PDF - Table alignment is not correct
PDFNEWNET-36093	watermark is not being added in pdf in C++/cli

summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
